msg: Would recommend not using hardwood floor because it would be easily scratched. Can start working immediately.
Change the table top material to marble, it would be a better fit for the room. Also the toilet should be made of ceramic, not cork.
The room seems good, I can start working on the 15th.
Since its a washroom, you should use tile for the flooring and not hardwood. Other than that the room seems good and I can start work anytime.
